com.topologi.schematron
Class SchtrnParams

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.Dictionary
        |
        +--java.util.Hashtable
              |
              +--com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map, java.io.Serializable
public class SchtrnParams
extends java.util.Hashtable

Store a set of Schematron parameters that can be used when creating the validating XSLT stylesheet.
Each entry has a key that is equal to the name of the parameter that should be passed to the stylesheet (e.g. 'phase'). The value for the entry is the actual value of the parameter (e.g. '#ALL')

See Also:
